mapper.insert: insert into sys_sms_log ( sms_id, sms_log_title, cre_time, upd_time )values( #{sms_id}, #{sms_log_title}, now(), now() )
mapper.select:
select g.sms_id,g.sms_log_title,o.sms_state as sms_state,o.sms_content as sms_log_content,o.sms_author,o.sms_rec_obj from sys_sms_log g inner join sms_info o on g.sms_id=o.sms_id
order by g.upd_time desc
